Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery light chalice; creamy white slip; interior: glazed black with band of diagonal strokes between added red and white lines; exterior: painted decoration consisting of part of himation (black with two flecks in faded colour and a border of black dots between brown lines).
Curator's comments: Lemos describes part of a lotus flower above parallel lines on the interior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 277, no. 748, pl. III, pl. 98)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0752) (phase 2)
